description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch their limbs and body to extreme lengths. The rubber body also makes the user immune to blunt force attacks and electricity, but vulnerable to cutting and piercing attacks.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child. Revealed in Episode 1 that he already has these powers.

abilityReveals.description: User's entire body has the properties of rubber, allowing it to stretch and bounce back from blunt attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrated when Alvida's iron mace attacks bounce off Luffy harmlessly due to his rubber body.

abilityReveals.description: User stretches their arm back and launches a powerful punch forward with tremendous force.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses this attack to defeat Alvida, sending her flying off the ship and into the ocean with a single punch.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness in seawater
User becomes unable to move in standing water

strengths.description: The rubber body bounces back blunt force trauma, making weapons like clubs, hammers, and punches ineffective.

strengths.strength: Body can stretch to extreme lengths
strengths.description: Allows for long-range attacks and enhanced mobility.
